i cannot reproduce it either
please reopen if you have a test case
i guess that my freshly opened bug 120432 is about the same problem, although the stack trace is slightly different.

Reopening as I have a working (ok, NOT working ;) ) test case. Line numbers are different but stack trace call hierarchy seems the same as the original poster's one.

Test case against 3.2M4:

public class Foo {
	Object o = Bar.Baz.A;
}
public class Bar {
	public enum Baz { A; }

	public static boolean a(Baz baz) {
		return baz == Baz.A;
}}

To reproduce the bug please try to Refactor->Move Member Type to New File... enum Baz.
It's important that both classes are top-level ones.
